t: Amazon’s new 'Buy for Me' feature helps customers find and buy products from other brands’ sites
s: April 3, 2025 - New beta feature allows customers to use their Amazon Shopping app to complete purchases from other brand retailer websites if Amazon doesn’t sell the item directly.

t: Amazon's new AI feature 'Interests’ let's customers describe their shopping needs

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 3 days ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon

t: Amazon sellers can now automatically improve product listings with our new Gen AI tool

t: Amazon's new AI agent will shop third-party sites for you | TechCrunch
s: April 4, 2025 - Amazon is starting to test a new AI shopping agent — a feature it calls "Buy for Me" — that visits other websites and makes purchases for users.

t: BASDEHEN Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Chenfeng Store | CPSC.gov
